pullrequest.title: Add training as a segway-task and create observations in a temporary directory

content.raw: It's worth noting that `observations.save()` and, also as a result, `observations.write_tab_file` are no longer called. I forgot to mention this earlier in the PR since it can be considered for removal or keeping. The only time they might be used is in the future when there's the possibility of having the observation files cached somewhere. Should the code just be removed?
content.html: It's worth noting that observations.save() and, also as a result, observations.write_tab_file are no longer called. I forgot to mention this earlier in the PR since it can be considered for removal or keeping. The only time they might be used is in the future when there's the possibility of having the observation files cached somewhere. Should the code just be removed?
